import React, { useState } from "react"; import {Button, Modal} from "react-bootstrap"; import Calendar from "react-calendar"; function DisplayModal(props) { const [state, setState] = useState(false); function handleModal(){ setState(!state) } return(

{props.name}

Activity Periods
From To
{props.activity_periods[0].start_time} {props.activity_periods[0].end_time}
{props.activity_periods[1].start_time} {props.activity_periods[1].end_time}
{props.activity_periods[2].start_time} {props.activity_periods[2].end_time}
) } export default DisplayModal;
